tool.help:
.. class:: infomark
**What it does**
In this function, an ultrafast and memory-efficient tool **Bowtie 2** (Langmead *et al*., 2009; Langmead *et al*., 2012) for aligning sequencing reads, reads coverage was measured by **SAMtools** (Danecek *et al*., 2021) and **BEDTools** (Quinlan *et al*., 2010).
-----
.. class:: infomark
**Inputs**
- **Input the transfrags file:** Input the transfrags in FASTA format - **Input FASTQ files:** Input cleaned sequence reads in FASTQ format
-----
.. class:: infomark
**Parameters**
- **Min reads coverage:** The transfrags with minimal reads coverage (default: 3)
-----
.. class:: infomark
**Outputs**
- **Filtered transfrags with reads coverage in FASTA format**
